sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2001, ch, 75, § 1 repealed 13-2-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 245, § 1, regarding the auditing of freight bills by the public regulation commission, effective June 15, 2001. For provisions of former section,seethe 2000 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
